item.title: 3D objects, date, time
item.description: Spark AR filters The process looks like this: You describe your ideas; We discuss everything; I work on the filter; I send a filter testing link, so you can try it on; You approve it; I send you the files. You will get: Filter file; Filter icon; Instructions on how to upload a filter.
